thread.title: Woman whose weight plummeted by 12st due to mystery vomiting illness is now so convinced she will die she’s planning her own funeral
thread.title_full: Woman whose weight plummeted by 12st due to mystery vomiting illness is now so convinced she will die she’s planning her own funeral

author: hrichardson
title: Woman whose weight plummeted by 12st due to mystery vomiting illness is now so convinced she will die she’s planning her own funeral
text:
Mrs Crunch ‘I’d give anything to be 18st again’ Woman whose weight plummeted by 12st due to mystery vomiting illness is now so convinced she will die she’s planning her own funeral 
Claire Connolly, 25, now tips the scales at just six stone with a BMI of 14 and is desperate to get her old life back Exclusive
